Frequently Asked Questions

How does LifeOS keep my data private?

We use end-to-end encryption. Your sensitive data is encrypted in your browser before it ever reaches our servers. We physically cannot access your encrypted data - only you hold the keys.

What AI models power LifeOS?

We use GPT-5 for language understanding, custom-trained models for entity extraction, and vector embeddings for semantic search. All powered by our intelligent memory graph architecture.

Can I cancel anytime?

Absolutely. No contracts, no commitments. Cancel anytime with one click. Your data remains accessible for 30 days after cancellation.

Do you integrate with my existing tools?

Yes! We integrate with Gmail, Google Calendar, Slack, Notion, Obsidian, and many more. More integrations added every week.

What happens if I exceed my usage limits?

We'll notify you as you approach limits. On Pro and above, overage is billed at low per-unit rates. The Free plan simply pauses non-essential features until next month.

Is there a free trial?

The Free plan is free forever - no trial needed! Pro, Team, and Enterprise plans include a 14-day free trial. No credit card required.
